a few weeks ago I had a chance to go to

the

and woman were worshiping all together
they were together while doing the Tava
the circular walk around the CBA they
were together while praying and if you
wonder why this is interesting at all
you have to see the rest of Saudi Arabia
because this is a country which is
strictly divided between the sexes in
other words as men you are not simply
supposed to be in the same physical
space with women and I noticed this in a
very funny way I uh I left the CBA to

to the nearest Burger King restaurant
and I went there I noticed that there's
a male section which is carefully
separated from the female section and I
had to pay order eat at the male section
it's funny I said to myself you can
mingle with the opposite sex at the holy
cabba but not at the Burger
King quite quite ironic ironic and it's
also I think quite telling because the

that of prophet Muhammad and if there

that way this is also I think confirmed

that trend is generally called as
Islamic
modernism and it was Advanced by

pi Muslims in Turkey saw that they can
